t=int(raw_input())
x=0
for x in range(0,t):
    n=int(raw_input())
    a,b,c=raw_input().split()
    a,b,c=[int(a),int(b),int(c)]
    num1=0
    count=0
    for num1 in range(1,10):
         num=(num1*10000)+(a*1000)+(b*100)+(c*10)
         j=0
         for i in range(num,num+10):
             if i%n==0:
                 ans=i/n
                 ans1=num1
                 ans2=j
                 count=999
             j=j+1
    if count==999:
        
        print ("%d %d %d\n" %(ans1,ans2,ans)) 
    else:
        print "0\n"
